item.title: He's alive! ALIVE!
item.description:
So it’s been…

Holy shit! It’s been FOUR. FUCKING. YEARS. Probably worth a bit of a recap then…

When last we paid visit to Beercave Towers, I’d just gotten done releasing the voxel games. After that, things went a wee bit haywire. Let’s see:
